actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans.

actions.committee: Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of Veterans' Affairs to accept gifts for the benefit of all Departmental programs.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to accept gifts, devises, and bequests on behalf of the Department of Veterans Affairs as long as such acceptance would not: (1) reflect unfavorably on the Department's ability to carry out official responsibilities and duties objectively; and (2) compromise the integrity or appearance of integrity of a Government program or of any official involved in that program. Requires the Secretary to establish criteria for making such determinations.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of Veterans' Affairs to accept gifts for the benefit of all Departmental programs.
